M

Main - Class in Driver
This class is the main driver class which interacts with the user and drives the program according to users input
Main() - Constructor for class Driver.Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Driver.Main
This is the main method which runs the program
Main_Test - Class in Driver
This is the JUnit Test cases for Main class.
Main_Test() - Constructor for class Driver.Main_Test
 
mainView - Static variable in class Driver.Main
object of Mainview created.
MainView - Class in Views
This class is used to get user input for different method used in it.
MainView() - Constructor for class Views.MainView
This is the default constructor of MainView which takes input value.
Map - package Map
 
Map - Class in Map
This class is used to create a full Map, a map has a list of continents and territories.
Map() - Constructor for class Map.Map
This is the default constructor of the Map class and will be used to create the main game play map.
Map(String, int) - Constructor for class Map.Map
This method is a constructor of the Map class which will be mainly used to create a continent inside a map.
Map.Territory - Class in Map
This inner class is used to create a Map.
Map_Test - Class in Map
This is the JUnit Test cases for Map class.
Map_Test() - Constructor for class Map.Map_Test
 
mapSelection() - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method asks user about map selections.
mapSelectionView() - Method in class Views.MainView
This method will display three options to select 1.create a new map,2.to edit a map,3.load a previous map.
moveArmiesToNewTerritory(String, String, int) - Method in class Player.Player
The method will move armies to new territory conquered only if defender looses it.
